name: Verify Create Chatbot API when required fields are missing (Negative Case) -- @1.2

steps.name: Given Firebase_User sends POST request to create a chatbot with missing required fields "chatbot_name"
When Firebase_the user receives the response
Then Firebase_the status code should be 400 for bad request error
And Firebase_the response should contain an error message "Bad Request"
And Firebase_the message should contain "Invalid input:"

fullName: Create Chatbot API: Verify Create Chatbot API when required fields are missing (Negative Case)
